name: HxRogueLike - a roguelike prototype for HaxeFlixel
name_original: HxRogueLike - a roguelike prototype for HaxeFlixel
description:
Here you can find the repository of the game. I am making 10 simple game prototypes with HaxeFlixel as a fun way to learn! This is the 7th.

Special thanks to Hamzalopode for his awesome tile set and sprites! You can find them here!
